scripts.test:watch: mocha --recursive --reporter min test ; gaze --silent "mocha --recursive --reporter min test" "*" "lib/**/*" "test/**/*"
scripts.examples: mocha --recursive examples --reporter index.js || echo '* End of example tests *'
scripts.dogfood: mocha --recursive --reporter index.js test ; gaze --silent "mocha --recursive --reporter index.js test" "*" "lib/**/*" "test/**/*"
